column1: [108]  The  above  passage  of  the  judgment  of  Soertsz  J.  suggests  that  the
following  test  would  apply  to  identify  whether  the  profits  and  income  of  an
individual or business fall within section 3(1)(a) or 3(1) (e):

column2: If  the  profits  or  income  received  from  dividends  or  interest  or  discounts
